parameters.name: Operations
parameters.label: Activities
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' 
| summarize Count = count() by Operation
| order by Count desc, Operation asc
| project Value = Operation, Label = strcat(Operation, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange'
//| extend OperationType = case( Operation contains 
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| summarize count() by Operation, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Activities, by time

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' 
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| summarize count() by UserType 
//| order by count_
content.title: User type activities

content.query:
let data = OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' 
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations});
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Operation , UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId, Operation
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId, Operation
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, Operation, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on UserId
| project Id, Name = Operation, Type = 'Operation', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Operation Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activities

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and UserType == 'Admin' 
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| summarize count() by Operation
content.title: Admin activities

content.query:
//Exchange activities that are performed by actors outside your organization - external
let OI = dynamic({OperationInfo});
OfficeActivity
| where (OI.Type=="*" or (OI.Type == 'UserId' and OI.Name == UserId) or (OI.Type == 'Operation' and OI.Name == Operation))
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange'
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| where ExternalAccess == 'True' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_
content.title: External access activities, by activities

content.query:
//Exchange activities that are performed by actors outside your organization - external
let OI = dynamic({OperationInfo});
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange'
| where (OI.Type=="*" or (OI.Type == 'UserId' and OI.Name == UserId) or (OI.Type == 'Operation' and OI.Name == Operation))
| where "{Operations:lable}" == "All" or Operation in ({Operations})
| where ExternalAccess == 'True' 
| summarize Amount = count() by Operation, UserId, UserType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project Amount, Activity = Operation, UserId, UserType, TimeGenerated
| order by Amount desc

//Hard delete operations over time
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation contains 'HardDelete'
| summarize count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now()), UserId
content.title: Hard delete activities

content.query:
let OperationsData = OfficeActivity
| where Operation in ("Set-Mailbox", "Log-on", 'Add-MailboxPermission', 'UpdateFolderPermissions', 'Remove-MailboxPermission')
| extend Category = case( Operation == "Set-Mailbox", "Mailbox creation",
                                Operation == "Log-on", "Log-in",
                                Operation == "Add-MailboxPermission" or Operation == "UpdateFolderPermissions" or Operation == "Remove-MailboxPermission", "Permission activities",
                                "");
OperationsData
| summarize Count = count() by Category
| join kind = inner (OperationsData
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Category)
 on Category
 | project-away Category1, TimeGenerated
| extend Categorys = Category
| union (
 OperationsData
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (OperationsData
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Category = 'All', Categorys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10

//Mailbox Logins by hour
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation == 'MailboxLogin'
| summarize Logins = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
content.title: Mailbox logins, by hour

content.query:
//The type of mailbox access. (type of user who accessed the mailbox) 
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation == 'MailboxLogin' 
| summarize count() by Logon_Type
content.title: Mailbox logins, by user type

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation == 'Set-Mailbox' 
| project TimeGenerated , UserId , UserType
content.title: New mailboxes created

content.query:
//Mailbox permissions changes
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation in ('Add-MailboxPermission', 'UpdateFolderPermissions', 'Remove-MailboxPermission')
| summarize count() by Operation
| sort by count_
content.title: Mailbox permissions changes
